title: Showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Meteorology Department states that showers will occur at times in the Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.

title: Cambodia calls for immediate ceasefire with Thailand
byline: Cambodia has called for an “immediate” ceasefire with Thailand, after two days of cross-border fighting between the two South East Asian neighbours.
